DOC.detailed_description: This project support post-third-grade assessment 693 child family enrol randomized trial program prenatal infancy home visitation nurse epidemiologically theoretically ground . The sample enrol composed low-income woman previous live birth largely African American ( 92 % ) , unmarried ( 98 % ) , adolescent ( 67 % ) time registration pregnancy . In early phase assessment , program find improve quality care patient provide child , reduce child 's health-care encounter injury detect , increase child 's sequential processing skill measure KABC , reduce number dysregulated aggressive violent theme express response MacArthur Story Stem Battery , improve maternal life-course reflect few subsequent pregnancy , reduce use welfare , increase marriage cohabitation biological father child . Many benefit area parental care-giving child function concentrated child mother psychological resource ( psychological resource define absence mental disorder symptom , adequate intellectual functioning , belief control life circumstance ) . The project determine whether beneficial effect program maternal , child , family function extend early elementary school year , give particular attention maternal life-course child 's emerge antisocial behavior .
